scripts.build:dev: echo 'Building development version...' && npm run copy-files && npm run minify:dev
scripts.build:prod: echo 'Building production version...' && npm run copy-files && npm run minify:prod
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r manifest.json popup content background options icons dist/
scripts.minify:prod: echo 'Production build complete - add minification here'
scripts.watch: npm run build:dev && echo 'Watching for changes...' && nodemon --watch popup --watch content --watch background --ext js,css,html --exec 'npm run build:dev'
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && echo 'Extension ready for development. Load dist/ folder in Chrome.'
scripts.zip: npm run build:prod && cd dist && zip -r ../sacco-extension.zip . && cd .. && echo 'Extension packaged as sacco-extension.zip'
